attributes.action: For PC Birch to be charged for assault for the taser attack on Daniel Dove.
attributes.additional_details: PC Lee Birch was cleared of assault and misconduct against Daniel Dove. Daniel dove was detained, in a cell and naked. He was not a threat. There were two officers in with him at the time. He used his underwear to fling in an officers face. The actions of this officer were disgusting. I don't understand how he could be cleared. It is down to the average person like you and I to stand up for our rights.
